name: Procedural Tarot
description:
Procedural Tarot provides you with a procedurally generated deck of cards, suitable for divining the future, answering questions about your life, and accessing the unknowable.

Use a different deck every time, or come back to the same deck, reshuffled, again and again.

Available at https://tarot.hashbase.io/ and on Beaker Browser at dat://2c3ca86c59d6c5ea06d13462171fd23aef6dd36017c1475f793122d442041590/.
